lines.i: The system that a complaint seems to affect

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.140"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10784)/@code="69468-7" Primary anatomic organ system of chief complaint NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10783)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10786), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet OrganSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.77 STATIC (CONF:10785)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.08
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10784)/@code="69468-7" Primary anatomic organ system of chief complaint NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10783)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10786), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet OrganSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.77 STATIC (CONF:10785)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.08
